title: Incorrect enablement of 'Build' popup action
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This is incorrect behavior.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when the user has not selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Go to Preferences > Workbench and select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'. 3. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective and observe that the 'Build' action is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
